channel.title: Afk command!

item.title: Afk command!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

omg learn to indent for once

        if (command.startsWith("afk")) {
            startAnimation(1353);            
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            txt4 = "I'm AFK!";               
            string4UpdateRequired = true;                     
        }
        if (command.startsWith("back")) {
            startAnimation(6);            
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            txt4 = "I'm Back!";               
            string4UpdateRequired = true;                     
        }

Maybe varibles once in awhile will help

Read full topic

item.title: Afk command!
item.dc:creator: @johnj98 johnj98
item.description:
@johnj98 wrote:

[quote=“dark power, post:1, topic:224345”]alot of people are askin for me afk and back command so here it is
rep me: dark power

if (command.startsWith(“afk”))
{
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = “I’m AFK!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“back”))
{
startAnimation(6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = “I’m Back!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}[/quote]
I hpe you burn in hellscape.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Afk command!
item.dc:creator: @dark_power dark power
item.description:
@dark_power wrote:

alot of people are askin for me afk and back command so here it is
rep me: dark power

if (command.startsWith(“afk”))
{
startAnimation(1353);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = “I’m AFK!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

if (command.startsWith(“back”))
{
startAnimation(6);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

txt4 = “I’m Back!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
}
